sentences.english: I will graduate from eking University this July. I have majored in accounting.
sentences.chinese: 今年七月将从北京大学毕业，我主修的专业是会计学。

sentences.english: It is the last day of qi yue and our geomancer says it is auspicious.
sentences.chinese: 那是七月的最后一天，风水师父说是个吉祥的日子。

sentences.english: New England had frosts in July.
sentences.chinese: 七月的新英格兰地区还在霜冻。

sentences.english: The Chinese Valentine's Day is on July 7th on the Lunar Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 中国情人节是农历七月七日。

sentences.english: July 14 ghosts door open, short-lived starve not vegetarian dish called jai.
sentences.chinese: 七月十四鬼门开，短命饿死不吃斋。

sentences.english: July, she will fly, and give no warning to her flight.
sentences.chinese: 七月，她远走高飞，对我不辞而别。

sentences.english: In end of July, there's the Malibu Art Festival, which has a bit of everything.
sentences.chinese: 在七月底，则是马利布艺术节，有很多可看的东西。

sentences.english: In July, Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton challenged China over its claims to wide areas of the South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 七月，国务卿希拉蕊挑战南海主权上挑战中国。

sentences.english: It emerged in July that Milly Dowler's mobile phone had been hacked after her death.
sentences.chinese: 七月时米莉多乐的手机在她死后遭到窃听。

sentences.english: It is nto the same thing to have a bare field in January and in Juluy.
sentences.chinese: 一月和七月的荒野是截然不同的。

sentences.english: July's high topples the previous record set in July 2015.
sentences.chinese: 今年七月气温新高打破了之前2015年7月的纪录。

sentences.english: As told me recover spirit, waiting for a long time the rain in July.
sentences.chinese: 好像在告诫我恢复心神，去守候七月一场久违的雨景。

sentences.english: For me, the july twentieth affair was in every way a calamity .
sentences.chinese: 就我来说，七月二十日事件完全是大祸临头。

sentences.english: They were at school on Monday, February 2nd.
sentences.chinese: 七月七号，星期六那天他们在乳制品店里。

sentences.english: Girl, it has been one year and seven months since we were torn apart.
sentences.chinese: 转眼间，我们分开至今已是一年零七月了。

sentences.english: Yuan Yuan twenty-eight years in July, the court approved the construction of an independent county town of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 元朝至元二十八年七月，朝廷同意上海镇建独立县。

definition: first month of the lunar year
